SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network

Interface Client

All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public interface Client
This interface is used to define the methods that the client must implement. The client is the player that is connected to the server and that can play the game.
